Oct 28 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:: *HALF YEAR RESULTS
*H1 REVENUE 2.272 BILLION USD
*AIRTEL AFRICA - HY UNDERLYING EBITDA GREW BY 35.2% TO $1,098M IN REPORTED CURRENCY *AIRTEL AFRICA - BOARD HAS DECLARED AN INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 2 CENTS PER SHARE *AIRTEL AFRICA - HY CUSTOMER BASE GREW BY 5.4% TO 122.7 MILLION


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 28-OCT-202106:00:03 GMT
